just before they'd let our anxious
parents come barreling through the gates
the camp director would say quick

within a few minutes the camp was
spotless
and I thought why not apply that

was a little bit weird I took a

using Instagram there was no rhyme or

another photo and another photo and I

therefore approachable that thing that
was on the ground that a either a didn't

that's a cigarette that's not that is
that's not and they came up with a
